name: 陳信安
objective:
本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.
schedule:
1. Introduction of X-ray
2. Crystal
3. Insight of diffraction
4. Geometry and intensity
5. Measurements
6. Phase identification
7. Determination of crystal structure
8. Crystallinity and polycrystal
materials:
(Optional)
Elements of X-ray Diffraction 3/e, B. D. Cullity & S. R. Stock
